backend/main.mo: Defines core data types, comparison helpers, and in-memory maps for posts, messages, job posts, profiles, and access control, integrating authorization and blob-storage mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking attachment-rendering requirements to affected frontend file and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and recent updates of various frontend files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base and theme variable definitions providing light/dark mode OKLCH color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entrypoint that loads the React application via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component handling authentication, profile initialization, and dashboard/landing rendering with timeout-based profile loading.
frontend/src/components/AdminBadge.tsx: Simple badge component showing an ADMIN label with a shield icon.
frontend/src/components/AdminBanner.tsx: Admin-only banner that polls for report notifications and allows dismissing them.
frontend/src/components/CoachDirectory.t: Coach directory with search, follow/unfollow, admin delete actions, and profile detail modal integration.
frontend/src/components/CoachProfileDeta: Displays a detailed coach profile modal with tabs, posts, job listings, and admin actions including follow/unfollow and account deletion.
frontend/src/components/EditPostModal.ts: Provides a modal for editing a postâ€™s text and attachments, handling updates and file management.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders a simple footer with branding and an external link.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Shows the site header with login/logout, theme toggling, and user dropdown with profile info.
frontend/src/components/ImageCropper.tsx: Empty placeholder component with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/JobBoard.tsx: Implements a job board with posting, viewing, applying, and admin deletion of job listings.
frontend/src/components/MessagingHub.tsx: Provides a messaging interface for viewing connections and exchanging direct messages.
frontend/src/components/MyProfile.tsx: Provides a user profile page with editable fields, photo upload, and admin badge display driven by multiple query hooks.
frontend/src/components/PostAttachmentRe: Renders post attachments by detecting file type and displaying images inline or offering external open/download links for other types.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Modal for initial profile setup allowing users to enter details, select roles/positions, and upload a photo before saving.
frontend/src/components/SocialFeed.tsx: Implements the social feed with posts, comments, likes, attachments, sorting, and admin actions using various backend queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and invalidates dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication, login flow, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Provides React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, photos, and related data via the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and CSS variables for light and dark theme styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with Internet Identity and React Query providers.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the main dashboard with tabbed navigation for feed, coaches, jobs, messages, and profile.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Renders the public landing page with hero section, features, and login button using Internet Identity.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom theme variables, plugins, and responsive settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project configuration, known issues, and feature requests related to attachment rendering.
